1534420.name: Kicking The Ball Over Mountains of Stuff
1534420.description: Kicking The Ball Over Mountains of Stuff is a 2D side-scrolling platform game inspired by "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy." In this game, players control a character tasked with kicking a virtual ball over a mountainous terrain made up of various obstacles and challenges. Using precise timing and skillful kicks, players must navigate the ball through a series of increasingly difficult levels to reach higher elevations. The mountain is composed of a variety of objects, including rocks, trees, and other environmental elements, providing a challenging and dynamic gameplay experience. With realistic physics and intuitive controls, "Get Over It: Mountain Kick" offers players a unique and addictive platforming experience as they strive to conquer the mountain and reach the highest summit.
1534420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
